name: Shengong "Daokou" Knife
description: The Shengong "Daokou" Knife is equivalent to Tier 2  Tech like the Iron Knife , giving Prospectors the ability to skin larger animals, such as Buffalo and Grizzly Bears . Unlike Throwing Knives , the Shengong "Daokou" Knife cannot be thrown. There currently are no Workshop throwing knives.
